title: Battle of Fredericksburg: Holding Against Union Attack - Ultimate General: Civil War Gameplay
description:
Today we are back playing Ultimate General: Civil War!  We are going to command the CSA at the Battle of Fredericksburg.  The Union outnumber us quite a bit, but we have the defensive advantage.  We must have victory here to win the American civil War.  Enjoy the battle :D 


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
